name: DeLaune and Associates
description:
For more than 30 years, DeLaune and Associates has produced advertising, marketing and public relations results you can count on. By working as an extension of your team, we can help you meet your goals from a place of mutual respect, integrity and talent. What Renee DeLaune began in 1981 as a one-person consulting company has grown to a full-service communications agency.
Our talented team includes experts in design, copy writing, public relations, and account services across many industries.
READ MORE...
